document_data.caption: A map showing the northern portion of Roguerun Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Roguerun Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Roguerun Alley''' was a small back alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Roguerun Alley was located in the northwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley was situated in a small neighborhood located in between the [[Street of Glances]] and [[Breeze's Cut]], branching from Breeze's Cut in the north, passing through the neighborhood, and exiting to join [[Westwall Street]].
